meanings.sent1: The movie portrayed an antierotic atmosphere, focusing on friendship rather than romance.
meanings.sent2: The painting's antierotic theme made it suitable for all audiences.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show humorously poked fun at antierotic situations, keeping it light-hearted.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was an antierotic shield, warding off any unwanted attention.
meanings.sent5: The play used an antierotic backdrop to emphasize the characters' platonic relationships.

meanings.definition: Not arousing or stimulating sexual desire.
meanings.sent1: The plain design of the room created an antierotic ambiance.
meanings.sent2: The antierotic novel focused on intellectual pursuits rather than physical attraction.
meanings.sent3: The antierotic advertisement humorously showcased a product that repelled rather than attracted.
meanings.sent4: The antierotic music video used muted colors and slow movements to convey a lack of sensuality.
meanings.sent5: The antierotic perfume failed to evoke any romantic feelings, leaving the wearer disappointed.
